title: 220506-DP-BestOf
itunes:title: 220506-DP-BestOf
description:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, DP recaps last night's NBA Playoff Actions and talks Shohei Ohtani's big day on the diamond. Mike Tirico joins us from Churchill Downs to preview the Kentucky Derby. What storylines should we be paying attention to going into the big race. And ESPN's Heather Dinich calls in to discuss NIL.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
